sections.heading: to 1-10A-3 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1994, ch. 3, § 2, repealed 1-10A-1 through 1-10A-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 17, §§ 1 through 3, the Ballot Positioning Act, effective January 31, 1994. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1993 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
